question: Based on the chart, which statement about rainfall (mm) over the past 14 days is accurate?

options.A: The rainfall amount was highest at the end of the period.
options.B: Rainfall was greater at the beginning than at the end of the period.
options.C: Each day's rainfall was consistently below 50mm.
options.D: It rained more than 80mm on only one of these days.

explanation: The x-axis has been manipulated to reorder the days. Initially, it seems the rainfall peaked at the end, but it was actually higher at the start.
